misuses.vulnerable_code: public C6(String defAlgo) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException { defaultAlgo = defAlgo; }
misuses.description: The constructor of the C6 class uses a hardcoded algorithm (IDEA) to encrypt data, which is a weak encryption algorithm. This can be exploited by attackers to crack the encryption and access the sensitive data.
misuses.recommendation: Use a more secure encryption algorithm such as AES or RSA, and consider using a randomly generated key instead of a hardcoded one.
